ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | negidi.1 | |- A e. CC |
| 2 |  | pncan3i.2 | |- B e. CC |
| 3 | 2 | #P_negcli | |- -u B e. CC |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_negdii | |- -u ( A + -u B ) = ( -u A + -u -u B ) |
| 5 | 1, 2 | #P_negsubi | |- ( A + -u B ) = ( A - B ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_negeqi | |- -u ( A + -u B ) = -u ( A - B ) |
| 7 | 2 | #P_negnegi | |- -u -u B = B |
| 8 | 7 | #P_oveq2i | |- ( -u A + -u -u B ) = ( -u A + B ) |
| 9 | 4, 6, 8 | #P_3eqtr3i | |- -u ( A - B ) = ( -u A + B ) |
